quotes.quote: As a proof that we are regenerated, we must regenerate everything around us.
The proof of humanity is that sometimes, we all make mistakes.
Proof by analogy is fraud.
Attack is the proof that your enemy anticipates your success.
The proof that one truly believes is in action.
Documents create a paper reality we call proof.
Absence of proof isn't proof of absence.
All proofs rest on premises.
The final proof of greatness lies in being able to endure criticism without resentment.
A proof tells us where to concentrate our doubts.
The proof of a man is the danger test, It shows him up at his worst, or his best.
The proof of the pudding is in the eating.
The very best proof that something can be done is that someone has already done it.
That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.
Proof of war, when it comes, always comes too late.
By far the best proof is experience.
Scars are proof we can can survive.
A proof is a proof. What kind of a proof? It's a proof. A proof is a proof. And when you have a good proof, it's because it's proven.
A good proof is one that makes us wiser.
Do not consider it proof just because it is written in books, for a liar who will deceive with his tongue will not hesitate to do the same with his pen.
Proofs exist only in mathematics and logic, not in science.
You do not need proof for what people want to believe.
Proof is never definitive, after all; one has to begin again with each new person.
A proof once established is better left so.
